Sentencas: The poisoning effects of various trace contaminants in the coal-derived syngas stream at ppm and sub-ppm level on the performance of Ni-YSZ/YSZ/LSM solid oxide fuel cells were studied at extended duration.
Titulo: Effect of various coal contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part II. ppm and sub-ppm level testing

Sentencas: The thermochemical nature of impurities such as PH3(g) and CH3Cl(g) in presence and absence of water steam was analyzed by a high temperature mass spectrometer.
Titulo: Effect of various coal contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part II. ppm and sub-ppm level testing

Sentencas: Only less than half of PH3(g) is hydrolyzed, and CH3Cl(g) also co-exist with HCl(g).
Titulo: Effect of various coal contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part II. ppm and sub-ppm level testing

Sentencas: After a certain duration of exposure, 1 ppm AsH3(g), 0.5 ppm PH3(g), and 2.5 ppm CH3Cl(g) all caused some degree of degradation to the power density at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of various coal contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part II. ppm and sub-ppm level testing

Sentencas: Whereas 1 ppm of H2S(g) resulted in immediate performance loss.
Titulo: Effect of various coal contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part II. ppm and sub-ppm level testing

Sentencas: The mechanisms of degradation are mainly divided into two categories: surface adsorption effect (for S and Cl) and bulk reaction effect (for As and P).
Titulo: Effect of various coal contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part II. ppm and sub-ppm level testing

Sentencas: The controversies regarding the poisoning effect and mechanism of S are also discussed with the aid of thermodynamic equilibrium composition calculation.
Titulo: Effect of various coal contaminants on the performance of solid oxide fuel cells: Part II. ppm and sub-ppm level testing
